page.title: 08SECTION 4 - POOLEY BRIDGE
page.content: ECOLOGY - Foothpath from behind Sun Hotel along east side of river eventually to Barton. Footpath east side of lake into section 7 and to Waterside House. Footpath from the village to Howtown Road via Eusemere. EDUCATION - At Cracoe a former school building (closed l946) is now owned by the Pastoral Aid Soc. and formed into a camp. Educational, religious courses are held during summer months. EMPLOYMENT - Mostly farming with seasonal employment in hotels, bed & breakfast establishments, shops & boat hire. ENTERTAINMENT - Domino Drives which have superceded whist drives GOVERNMENT - Parish Council meets in Pooley and is responsible for the Civil Parish of Barton which extends from Barton Church to Swarthbeck & is responsible to Eden District Council.
